intro_lead: This tool helps you build an asset portfolio and calculate financial metrics based on historical data.
intro_footer: Start by searching for assets on the left.
intro_search_text: Use the left panel to search for financial instruments by name or ticker. Click 'Add' to include them in your portfolio.
intro_list_text: Selected assets appear below. Adjust quantities and click 'Calculate' to see portfolio statistics and charts.
chart_description_1: This chart presents total value of the portfolio (the sum of the most recent close price for each asset multiplied by respective amount). The interval of datapoints is 1 week and period presented is exactly one year (or 52 weeks) preceding latest available datapoint
weighted_average_portfolio_return_descri: Calculated as average of annualized weekly returns on each asset for the last year, weighted by their value in respective time periods.
expected_portfolio_return_description:
Calculated using CAPM, where market premium (for IMOEX) is calculated based on 10-year period of consecutive weekly returns, that where then averaged using geometric compounding and annualized.
Beta coefficient was calcualted similarly, using weekly returns on portfolio assets for the last 5 years. Weighted average of each asset beta comprised portfolio beta.
 Risk free rate was taken from CBR as YTM of government zero-coupon bonds with 1-year maturity.
